testcase.name: ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > generates initial ledger state deterministically
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > approves a Tier 1 loan and caps at the max amount
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > approves a Tier 2 loan and gives the requested amount
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > approves a Tier 3 loan
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > rejects a loan for a non-eligible applicant
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > creates multiple loans for the same user with incrementing IDs
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws an error if the user is blacklisted
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > allows admin to blacklist and remove a user
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > migrates a small number of loans (1 batch) and cleans up
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > migrates multiple batches of loans (7 loans) correctly
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws an error if user tries to requestLoan during migration
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > migrates loans to a new PIN that already has loans
